reviewText: Who can forget that unforgettable dual Tom and Jerry and all thier crazy antics. As a child Tom and Jerry cartoons were on my favorite cartoon list and now watching this lovable pair brought back so many memories. What is so great about Tom and Jerry is how it brings together and bonds generations. Even though Tom and Jerry are over 60 years old, my son and I were both equally excited to watch this DVD.Tom and Jerry Around the World DVD contains 22 cat and mouse fiasco's with new animation in some of their best around the world adventures  including destinations in New York, Spain, Hollywood and favorites like The Two Mouseketeers, Kangadoofus and who can forget Invasion of the Body Slammers.This DVD has so much action my son and I lost track of time as we watched episode after episode, had many laughs and talked about our favorites. We loved the bright and colorful cartoons and found ourselves looking forward to the next on the list. If you are a Tom and Jerry lover I would highly recommend Tom and Jerry Around the World for your viewing pleasure and your DVD collection. We gave this DVD collection 5 stars.
summary: Great memories and bonding time for my family.
Title: Tom and Jerry: Around the World

reviewText: The animators really tried to keep the original spirit of the classic shows in this modern incarnation. From the music, to the incidental characters and all the trouble Tom and Jerry got into, we really enjoyed it. It was lots of fun to watch with my son. It was new for both of us. Worth a purchase.
summary: Lots of fun with new episodes
Title: Tom and Jerry: Around the World

reviewText: My granddaughter laughs out loud at these cartoons, and it makes me join in. I remember when my mom and her 4-year-old grand-nephew used to get on the phone and "watch" Tom and Jerry together on television, laughing all the way through. Now I understand why. You can't watch in the company of a child without laughing together. What a fun diversion after spending a day together. And, we can agree to watch just a few at a time and save some for later because each DVD is pretty long. This one has 22 cartoons.
Title: Tom and Jerry: Around the World

reviewText: My indication on the video is amount of laughter from the grandkids. My grandchildren love Tom and Jerry and they enjoyed this video.
Title: Tom and Jerry: Around the World

reviewText: I chose 5 star because the product arrived within a few days and it was exactly what I was looking for.
Title: Tom and Jerry: Around the World

reviewText: My boys love it other than dora dvd this is their favorite. I highly recommend this dvd of tom and jerry.
Title: Tom and Jerry: Around the World
